showScoreExcerpt:
"Some of the problem with this 'Macbeth' is Broadway. Watching the production and often being very engaged, I kept thinking how much better this 'Macbeth' would be if staged in-the-round at NYTW or on a thrust stage at the Public Theater. The first act of Gold’s 'Macbeth' is very much the Living Room 'Macbeth.' That intimate approach doesn’t work as well on a Broadway proscenium stage with not one but two balconies out front."
